content: (I already posted this in wg-nll stream. Maybe it should have been in #general...) Anyway, I'm back from my initial two weeks of parental leave. Playing catchup. Potentially in an ongoing zombie state, at least mentally.
all is well; the babies are so much tinier than Logan was (and is, of course) that handling them feels quite surreal
plus the the youngest twin is a full pound lighter than the elder (!)
But also, regular cuteness overload, I guess :D
Well... I suppose it depends if one finds Kuato from 1990's "Total Recall" cute...
